name: The Inevitable Company
description:
You're the new game director at a company. You join mid-project and learn why it is impossible to hold your position there. 8 possible endings - but the same outcome.

Audio and more graphics are coming as an after GameJam update!
It might take a while (vacation coming up!), so if you're interested, be sure to follow me on Itch.io.

Changelog:
v1.0.1: Fixed some small spelling mistakes and a potential bug that prevents you from restarting.
v1.0.2: Fixed some small spelling mistakes.

Made with Godot v3.4.4
